segments.text: Miss Liu , have we received the fax from MS Company yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me check - - oh , here it is . It just arrived a few minutes ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent . I have been expecting it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You bet it is . It's about the new contract .
segments.speaker: S1
